short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect information from web resources along with URL and metadata that can be organized into collections.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Nexis® Hub makes it easy to streamline any research project, simply collect facts and “snippets” along with corresponding URLs and metadata from across the internet and safely save them into collections. Copy/paste errors and computer crashes will never hurt your research again! With Nexis Hub, you can quickly organize and seamlessly integrate your findings into reports with tools you use every day. In fact, users save an average of 50% of the time it takes to manually gather, collate, and share information. 

With Nexis® Hub, you can: 
•	Collect information from LexisNexis® products and across the web using the simple Google Chrome browser extension.
•	View, edit, annotate, and manage gathered data from the browser extension, the Nexis® Hub collections portal, or the Microsoft Word add-in.
•	Easily review corresponding links and metadata connected to your snippets for additional context. 
•	Access your snippets from within Microsoft Word to quickly insert and draft reports.
 
⭐ To use Nexis Hub you need an active subscription. If you’d like to subscribe, or get more information about Nexis Hub please visit https://professional.lexisnexis.com/try-nexis-hub
long.de,fr,nl:
Spend more time on what matters most: your insights. Nexis®​ Hub makes it simple to collect facts and “snippets”—along with corresponding URLs and metadata—from across the internet and from Nexis®, Nexis Newsdesk®, and Nexis DiligenceTM. With Nexis Hub, you can organize all your snippets into collections and seamlessly integrate your findings into reports with the tools you use every day. In fact, users save up 50% of the time it takes to manually gather, collate, and share information. Plus, copy/paste errors and computer crashes will never hurt your research again! Nexis Hub safely stores all your findings in collections. 

With Nexis® Hub, you can:
•	Collect information from LexisNexis® products and across the web using the simple Google Chrome browser extension.
•	View, edit, annotate, and manage gathered data from the browser extension, the Nexis® Hub collections portal, or the Microsoft Word add-in.
•	Easily review corresponding links and metadata connected to your snippets for additional context. 
•	Access your snippets from within Microsoft Word to quickly insert and draft reports.
 
Whether you’re analyzing competitors, identifying opportunities for growth, double-checking sources, or conducting due diligence for M&A deals, Nexis Hub streamlines the time-consuming process of gathering, evaluating and sharing data.
